#Text=PUBLIC NOTICE
#Text=That he will commence next week to Lecture in the country.
#Text=All his books and publications may be had after each
#Text=DR.
#Text=AIREY may be CONSULTED as usual on all diseases from nine p.m. till fo»r p.m., and his assistant from four p.m. till nine p.m.
#Text=Advice Free.
#Text=Dr. airey’s Hand-book to the botanic practice.
#Text=Price One Shilling. 50,000 copies of this excellent book have been sold in England alone in the course of
#Text=a few years.
#Text=Dr.
#Text=Airet’s Woman’s Friend ; or, Man-Midwifery Exposed, and the Diseases of Children.
#Text=Price Sixpence.
#Text=This is a good book for mothers and heads of families.
#Text=Should be in every working man’s house.
#Text=Dr.
#Text=Airey’s Young Man’s Friend.
#Text=Price Sixpence.
#Text=This is a book for young men only, and should be read by every young man.
#Text=Dr.
#Text=Airey has published his celebrated course of Six Lectures.
#Text=They will be sold at one penny each, to defray the cost of printing.
#Text=They may be had at the Lecture Hall, or after each lecture.
#Text=A Lecture on Medical Reform, price Id.
#Text=A Lecture on Consumption, price Id.
#Text=A Lecture on Fever, its Cause and Cure, price Id.
#Text=A Lecture on Inflammations, price Id.
#Text=A Lecture on Indigestion, price Id.
#Text=A Lecture on Rheumatism, price Id.
#Text=The above may he had by post for one stamp extra.
#Text=Dr.
#Text=Airey is the only qualified gentleman practising in Ashton-under-Lyne from America, and his Diplomas may seen at his Lecture Hall.
#Text=THE most conspicuous feature of KIT..
#Text=LORN’S Clothing Establishment is the department for the supply of Clothing for the industrious classes.
#Text=In this department is displayed an unrivalled stock of strong, cheap, and useful Clothing.
#Text=Working men’s baits for Sunday and holiday wear, of line double-milled cloth, £2 10s.

#Text=Specially adapted for the use of working men’s clothing are Killorn & Co.’s goods, consisting of strong Reaver and Pilot Cloths, Tweeds, Woollen and Bedford Cords, Beaverteens, Plushes, and Cotton Cords.
#Text=AND CO.’S
#Text=FOR WORKMEN,
#Text=AS HT6N-UND E it - L Y N E LOAN SOCIETY, held at Mr.
#Text=Joseph Hothwell’s, Market House Inn, Warrington-street.
#Text=Loans from £1 to £l5 granted on personal security.
#Text=Forms granted every Monday night, from half-past seven to nine o’clock p.m.
#Text=Five per cent, per annum given on all deposits from £1 and upwards.
